title: Time Traveller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to put into your time machine.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Selecting a townie will send them back in time to meet their older self, giving them a random ability or attribute from a game they played previously.
- Selecting an evil player result in you sending them forward in time, roleblocking them.
- Selecting a first time player will send them back to a random game the host played.

desc:
Post 3384
*I've traveled back in time for my slot.*
